channel.title: CVE Feed for ThingsForRestaurants -- Quick Restaurant Reservations (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-29923|2024-09-17T03:44:11.275Z -- thingsforrestaurants -- quick%20restaurant%20reservations%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ThingsForRestaurants Quick Restaurant Reservations (WordPress plugin) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Quick Restaurant Reservations (WordPress plugin): from n/a through 1.4.1.
